input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, you’ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Aeon Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Delta Line Tech Short Sleeve T-shirt'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Thermal Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Redux Istinto Corte Sleek Jersey'
  - Name='men Santini Lidl Trek Replica Long-sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='SANTINI Forza Indoor Training Jersey 2021'
  - Name='Fitri Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Range Men's Aero Mesh Cargo Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Scatto Men's Limited Edition Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Liège Bastogne Liège 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini Pure Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Vintage Wool Cycling Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a cycling jersey, like the reference, but has long sleeves instead of short. Both serve the same core function and target similar customers, but sleeve length is the main construction difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Delta Line Tech Short Sleeve T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though it is short-sleeved, this is a 'Tech T-shirt' rather than a form-fitting cycling jersey. It likely differs in fit, construction (e.g., looser silhouette), and pocket features.
A thermal cycling jersey implies heavier and warmer materials for cooler weather, but it is otherwise very similar in function and silhouette to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Redux Istinto Corte Sleek Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is likely a high-performance, close-fitting cycling jersey, very similar in construction, use, and features to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini Lidl Trek Replica Long-sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same product type as the reference, but with long sleeves. As a replica pro jersey, its function, fit, and features should be almost identical except sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This appears to be a lightweight performance cycling jersey, likely made with advanced materials and a similar construction to the reference, with an emphasis on eco materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A long-sleeve variant of a cycling jersey; only real difference is sleeve length. Similar performance, features, and silhouette.
A cycling jersey designed for indoor training. It shares core features and fit with the reference but may use lighter materials or have ventilation differences tailored to indoor use.
Appears to be a men's cycling jersey, but due to lack of further specification (e.g., could be a club or casual style), it may differ in construction or performance focus.
Directly comparable, this is a men's form-fitting, performance cycling jersey with likely similar materials, construction, and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pac Range Men's Aero Mesh Cargo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant: a performance cycling jersey (aero fit) with mesh panels and additional cargo features. Only minor feature differences compared to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Scatto Men's Limited Edition Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's short-sleeve cycling jersey, nearly identical in function, construction, and intended use to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Liège Bastogne Liège 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's short-sleeve standard cycling jersey, directly comparable in core function, construction, and features to the reference.
A 'Pure' long-sleeve cycling jersey, so base function and construction is the same, but with long sleeves.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Vintage Wool Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey, but made in a vintage wool style. While intended for the same activity and with a similar silhouette, it differs significantly in material and likely some features.
